title: How do you request to put something on the league of legends home menu?
body:
I wanna put this up for a youtuber named toocurly makes awesome music vids and I wanna give ashout to his amazing vids and help him grow his channel. 
And a way that i think i can do this is to add him on the league homepage.

replies.body:
It's usually featured and popular artists/content creators.
But quite a lot is possible.
